variationCategory.name: common_aa_polymorphisms
variationCategory.description: Amino acids at a given codon location which appear in more than 1% of public HCV sequences

variationCategory.name: resistance_associated_variants
variationCategory.description: Amino acids at a given codon location which have been associated with drug resistance

variationCategory.name: epitopes_mhc_class_i
variationCategory.description: Linear HCV epitopes in MHC Class I (HLA-A, B, C, E, F, G, K, L)
variationCategory.whereClause: is_epitope = 'true' and epitope_full_hla != 'HLA-Class II, allele undetermined' and (epitope_full_hla = 'HLA-Class I, allele undetermined' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-A%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-B%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-C%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-E%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-F%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-G%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-K%' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-L%')

variationCategory.name: epitopes_mhc_class_ii
variationCategory.description: Linear HCV epitopes in MHC Class II (HLA-DM, DO, DP, DP, DQ, DR)
variationCategory.whereClause: is_epitope = 'true' and epitope_full_hla = 'HLA-Class II, allele undetermined' or epitope_full_hla like 'HLA-D%'
